answers.answer: This is not diabetes related. Try Gynecology and Urology forums.

question: I posted a question on this site two days ago and i am wondering if i put it in the right category .Well here goes i am a type 2 diabetic ,diet controlled so far ,and i have noticed a red patch on  one side of my vagina . I did have blood tests last week ,so i dont know if my numbers have gone up yet .This red patch is worrying me sick .I have tried canestan and vagisil to no avail . Could some one please help
title: Diabetes and vaginal problems
